snippet: The Dodd-Frank law requires regulators to oversee private equity firms with at least $150 million in assets, leading to this settlement.
abstract: Blackstone Group has agreed to stop levying transaction fees for services that firm did not actually render, practice that has been criticized by Securities and Exchange Commission.
lead_paragraph: The Dodd-Frank law requires regulators to oversee private equity firms with at least $150 million in assets, leading to this settlement.

headline.main: Heightened Regulatory Scrutiny Makes Blackstone Halt Some Transaction Fees
headline.print_headline: Heightened Regulatory Scrutiny Makes Blackstone Halt Some Transaction Fees

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
